children.name: check coverage
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
data _null_;run;

/*gap
If less than one year (<90% of the days) is available, shift the index date forward in time to allow an individual
to fulfill this criteria whenever possible. Exclude those who do not fulfil this criteria
*/

/*an hypotheical case*/
data test1;
    format key_hsn $1. startdate date9. enddate date9. gap 8. ;
    input key_hsn @3 startdate anydtdte10. @14 enddate anydtdte10. @24 gap ;
    index_date = '01Jan2001'd+368;
    format index_date date9.;
    if gap=1 then do;
        gapdays=enddate - startdate +1;
        coverdays=0;
    end;
    else do;
        gapdays=0;
        coverdays=enddate - startdate +1;
    end;
    cards;
a 2001-01-01 2001-11-22 0
a 2001-11-23 2002-01-02 1
a 2002-01-03 2002-10-30 0
a 2002-10-31 2002-12-05 1
a 2002-12-06 2003-01-15 0
a 2003-01-16 2003-02-05 1
a 2003-02-06 2018-12-31 0
;

/*I would take the dumbest way, alright? I am going to list out all days between 1996-1-1 and 2018-03-01
    and calculate whether each day is covered.
*/
data test2;
    set test1;
    format newIndex_date date9.;
    if coverdays > 0;
    array covered_currentday[8096] _temporary_;
    do i = 1 to 8096;
        covered_currentday[i]=0;
        if covered_currentday[i] ne 1 then do;
            if startdate < '31dec1995'd + i < enddate then do;
                covered_currentday[i]=1;
            end;    
        end;
        sumcoverdays = 0;
        if i > 365 then do;
            do j = i-365 to i-1;
                sumcoverdays=sumcoverdays + covered_currentday[j];
            end;
        end;
        if sumcoverdays > int(365*.9) and '31dec1995'd + i >= index_Date then do;
            newIndex_date = '31dec1995'd + i;
            leave;
        end;
    end;
run;


%getCoverGAPs(
        rawfile=master_phrs_cov,
        ptFile=localt._BG,
        theCovXtrc=,
        start='01jan1995'd,
        end= '31mar2018'd,
        target=_BH11,
        cohortgroup=,
    debug=1
);

data _bh12;
    set _bh11;
    drop First_admin: cohort: age_first: sex ;
    if days >0;
    drop start end coverPCT gapPCT days gaps src birth;
run;


data _BH13;
    set _bh12;
    by key_hsn coverstart coverend;
    format newIndex_date date9.;
    array covered_currentday[8491] _temporary_; /*it starts from covered_currentday[1], not covered_currentday[0]*/
    /*the temporary array values are automatically retained*/
    do i = 1 to 8491; /*8491 are days between '01jan1995' and '31mar2018'd, has to start from 1
                                    as for studyStartDate ='01jan1996', it'll need to caculate covering days since '01jan1995'*/
        if first.key_hsn then covered_currentday[i] =0;
        currentday = '31dec1994'd + i; /*between '01jan1996' and '31mar2018'd*/
        if covered_currentday[i] ne 1 then do; /*if the value is already 1 (covered), do not change it*/
            if coverstart                 covered_currentday[i]=1;
            end;    
        end;
        if currentday >= StudyStartDate then do; /*only starting to look back the cumulative covering days since the index_date*/
            sumcoverdays = 0;
            do j = i-365 to i-1;
                sumcoverdays=sumcoverdays + covered_currentday[j]; /*calculate the cumulative covering days within 365 days prior to the current day*/
            end;
            /*if the number cumulative covering days is greater than 90% of a year (365 days), the currentday is the earliest
                    date of the new index_date*/
            if sumcoverdays > int(365*.9) then do;
                newIndex_date = currentday;
                leave;
            end;
        end;
    end;
    drop i j currentday sumcoverdays;
run;

data _BH14;
    set _BH13;
    by key_hsn coverstart coverend;
    if last.key_hsn;
    if newIndex_date ne .;
run;

/*how many person in _bh14: 5357*/
/*how many in _bh4? 5389, more!. need to check...*/
data _BH7;
    set _BH4;
    if &coverageVar = 0;
    drop cumuCoverGap MaxCoverGap;
run;

/*for those in both _BH7 and _BH14, the studystartdate should be the same*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BH14,
    t2=_BH7,
    target=test11,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.studyStartDate as studystartDate_bh14, t2.studystartDate as studystartDate_bh7,
                    t1.newIndex_date),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*4899, those in _BH7 are all in _Bh14*/

/*these 4899 patients all had the same the studystartdates (not changed)*/
data test12;
    set test11;
    if studystartDate_bh14 ne studystartDate_bh7 or studystartDate_bh14 ne newIndex_date or studystartDate_bh7 ne newIndex_date;
run;
/*Yes*/

                        /* patients in _bh7 but not in _bh14, why???*/
                        %sqljoinv2(
                            t1=_bh7,
                            target=test13,
                            vars=t1.*,
                            filters=%str(t1.key_hsn not in (select key_hsn from test11))
                        );

                        /*original coverage records*/

                        %sqljoinv2(
                            t1=_BH11,
                            t2=test13,
                            target=test14,
                            vars=%str(t1.*),
                            jtype=inner,
                            jvars=key_hsn
                        );


                        data test15;
                            set test14;
                            drop First_admin: cohort: age_first: sex ;
                            if days >0;
                            drop start end coverPCT gapPCT days gaps src birth;
                        run;


                        data test16;
                            set test15;
                            by key_hsn coverstart coverend;
                            format newIndex_date date9.;
                            array covered_currentday[8491] _temporary_; /*it starts from covered_currentday[1], not covered_currentday[0]*/
                            /*the temporary array values are automatically retained*/
                            do i = 1 to 8491; /*8461 are days between '01jan1995' and '31mar2018'd, has to start from 1
                                                            as for studyStartDate ='01jan1996', it'll need to caculate covering days since '01jan1995'*/
                                if first.key_hsn then covered_currentday[i] =0;
                                currentday = '31dec1994'd + i; /*between '01jan1996' and '31mar2018'd*/
                                if covered_currentday[i] ne 1 then do; /*if the value is already 1 (covered), do not change it*/
                                    if coverstart                                         covered_currentday[i]=1;
                                    end;    
                                end;
                                if currentday >= StudyStartDate then do; /*only starting to look back the cumulative covering days since the index_date*/
                                    sumcoverdays = 0;
                                    do j = i-365 to i-1;
                                        sumcoverdays=sumcoverdays + covered_currentday[j]; /*calculate the cumulative covering days within 365 days prior to the current day*/
                                    end;
                                    /*if the number cumulative covering days is greater than 90% of a year (365 days), the currentday is the earliest
                                            date of the new index_date*/
                                    if sumcoverdays > int(365*.9) then do;
                                        newIndex_date = currentday;
                                        leave;
                                    end;
                                end;
                            end;
                            format currentday date9.;
                        /*    drop i j currentday sumcoverdays;*/
                        run;

/*for those in _Bh14 but not in _bh7, the studystartdate is shifed*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_bh14,
    target=test17,
    vars=t1.*,
    filters=%str(t1.key_hsn not in (select key_hsn from _bh7))
);
data test18;
    set test17;
    drop coverEnd coverstart;
    days_shift=newindex_date - studystartDate;
run;

/*why some shifted for >5000 days?*/
data test19;
    set _bh11;
    if key_hsn ='74325324698';
run;

/*why some shfited for 0 days (why not in BH7)*/
data test19;
    set _bh11;
    if key_hsn ='01345354612';
run;
/*why? only havng a gap of 32 days*/

/*what about those having a newindex_date =. all the time?*/
s///
t///

children.name: BHA. Qtest4
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*BHA. How many patients have the first onset dx before reaching 18
    How many received the first DMT before 25
    The question was raised by Charity on 2019-10-09
    see the document at
    P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Documentation\Researcher - Analyst Documentation\Doc from the project team\DRUMs Jr Onset Digging 20191010.pdf

The idea is to get all the MS and demyelinating(dmlt) related diagnosis code, as well as DINs
    from hosp, msb, and drug claims.
    So as to determine:
    1. the date of the first MS/dmlt ICD code
    2. the date of the first DMT drug dispensation

Patients were from localt._b, in which the MS diagnosis qualification date has been determined.
    In _b, patients with first onset of ms/dmlt are not excluded. ms-related ICD codes ealier than the date reaching 18 were ignored.
        So the young patients should be there.
    (Those missing age, sex info or not fully covered with the previous 365 days are removed though)
*/

%print(data=localt._b);
/*In _b:
First_admin_code_date is the date with the first MS related icd/din code of which patients are qualified for MS diagnosis.
    e.g., if a patient had three MS related ICD/DIN codes on distinct dates, First_admin_code_date is the earliest of such dates in a roll.
    Age at this date can be < 18. However, it is only related to MS related codes, the DMLT related codes are not examined.
    This field is the diagnosis qualification date of MS (MS_DQDATe)
Birth and sex. These are useful to determine age/sex.
*/

data _BHA1;
    set localt._b;
    keep First_admin_code_date birth key_hsn sex;
run;

/*for patients in _BHA1, get their hosp/msb/drugclaim records*/

%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_dp_benefit.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_dp_benefit.sas7bdat)
);

%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_dp_nonbenefit.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_dp_nonbenefit.sas7bdat)
);

%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_hosp.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_hosp.sas7bdat)
);

%vbsUnzip(
    tgtDir=,
    zipFile=%str(&localDataPath.\master_msb.zip),
    srcFile=%str(master_msb.sas7bdat)
);

/*the ICD codes*/
%let msdlmtICDH = %str('340', '341', '3419', '323', '32382', '3773', 'G35', 'G360', 'G378', 'G369', 'G37', 'H46');
%let msdlmtICDM=%str('340', '341', '323', '377');
/*2a. Hosp MS-DMLT dx of the cohort in _BHA1*/
/*2a1 hosp records of the cohort in _BHA1*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_hosp,
    t2=_BHA1,
    target=_BHA2a1,
    vars=t1.*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

/*2a2 From _BHA2a1, select all ICD_Codes matching the MS/DMLT related ICD codes (msdlmtICDH)
    the setting allows to pick up all records with interested code.
    It could be that an interested ICD10 is picked up from a conv_dx_code (which is supposed to have ICD9) code.
    That is fine. As the CIHI data, esp those before 2001 are quite messed up.
    The approach adopted here allows to have all possible diagnoses.
    Conforming with the same rule in BA, the adm_date is used as the DxDate
*/
data _BHA2a;
    set _BHA2a1;
    src='h';
    array dxs $ dx_code_1 - dx_code_25;
    array cdxs $ conv_dx_code_1 - conv_dx_code_25;
    format type $5.;
    format code $10.;
    do i = 1 to 25;
            if dxs(i) in: (&msdlmtICDH) then do;
                type='dx';
                dxN=i;
                code=dxs(i);
                Dxdate = adm_date;
                output;
            end;
            if cdxs(i) in: (&msdlmtICDH) then do;
                type='cdx';
                dxN=i;
                code=cdxs(i);
                Dxdate = adm_date;
                output;
            end;
    end;    
    format dxdate date9.;
    keep key_hsn type dxN code adm_date dschg_date src Dxdate;
run;

/*2b. From MSB file, MS-DMLT dx of the cohort in _BHA1*/
/*2b1 MSB records of the cohort in _BHA1*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_MSB,
    t2=_BHA1,
    target=_BHA2b1,
    vars=t1.*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*2b2 From above, select records with a diag code in msdlmtICDM*/
data _BHA2b;
    set _BHA2b1;
    format type $5. DxDate date9.;
    if diag in: (&msdlmtICDM);
    DxDate = dos;
    rename diag=code;
    src = 'p';
run;

/*2c1 From pharmacy files, MS-DMLT dx of the cohort in _BHA1*/
/*From benefit and nonbenefit files, select claims of DMT (localT.a6_DINDx, which was saved by prog A)*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_dp_benefit,
    t2=localT.a6_dindx,
    target=_BHA2c1a,
    vars=*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=DIN
);
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=master_dp_nonbenefit,
    t2=localT.a6_dindx,
    target=_BHA2c1b,
    vars=*,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=DIN
);
/*Putting together*/
data _BHA2c1;
    set _BHA2c1a _BHA2c1b;
run;

/*2c2 DMT records of the cohort in _BHA1*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BHA2c1,
    t2=_BHA1,
    target=_BHA2c,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.Rx_ddddd as DxDate, t1.DIN as code, 'm' as src),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

/*To this step
    2a contains MS/DMLT related dx from hospital
    2b MS/DMLT related dx from MSB
    2c DMT medication from drug claims (from both benefit and nonbenefit files)
*/

/*3. Onset of MS/DMLT before 18
    The approach here is to merge 2a-2c together, and determine the earliest dxDate for each patient
    Next
*/
/*3a, merge dx records from hosp, msb, and pharmacy claims*/
data _BHA3a;
    set _BHA2a _BHA2b _BHA2c;
    keep key_hsn dxDate src code;
run;
/*3b. sort and for each patient keep the earlist DxDate*/
%sort(data=_BHA3a, sorter=key_hsn dxdate src code);
data _BHA3b;
    set _BHA3a;
    by key_hsn dxdate src code;
    if first.key_hsn;
    rename dxDate = MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate;
run;
/*3c. link the above to the cohort (_BHA1), add the dxdate src code info into the cohort*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BHA1,
    t2=_BHA3b,
    target=%str(_BHA3c (rename = (first_admin_code_date = MS_DQDate ))) ,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate,
                        int(yrdif(t1.birth, t2.MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate, 'age')) as Age_MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate,
                        int(yrdif(t1.birth, t1.first_admin_code_date, 'age')) as Age_MS_DQDate,
                        t2.src, t2.code),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=key_hsn
);
/*3d. from above, select those with Age_MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate < 18*/
data _BHA3;
    set _BHA3c;
    where Age_MSDLMTDMT_FirstDate < 18;
run;

%freq(data=_BHA3, table=code);

/*4. Of patients in 3d, the first DMT claim date */
/*4a. get dmt claims (in _BHA2c1) of patients in _BHA3*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BHA2c1,
    t2=_BHA3,
    target=_BHA4a,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.key_hsn, t1.Rx_ddddd, t1.DIN as code, 'm' as src),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn,
    orderby=%str(key_hsn, Rx_ddddd)
);

/*4b. for each patient, select the earliest Rx_ddddd*/
data _BHA4b;
    set _BHA4a;
    by key_hsn Rx_ddddd;
    if first.key_hsn;
    rename Rx_ddddd = DMT_FirstDate;
run;

/*4c. add the DMT_FirstDate to _BHA3*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BHA3,
    t2=_BHA4b,
    target=_BHA4c ,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.DMT_FirstDate,
                        int(yrdif(t1.birth, t2.DMT_FirstDate, 'age')) as Age_DMT_FirstDate
                    ),
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=key_hsn
);

/*4d. keep the patients received a DMT before age 25*/
data _BHA4d;    
    set _BHA4c;
    if Age_DMT_FirstDate < 25;
run;


/*5. More quesions from Helen
    e.g. Which calendar years first Rx was filled
*/
/*
5.a Which calendar years first Rx was filled
*/
data _BHA5a;
    set _BHA4c;
    agecat_DMT_FirstDate = '<25';
    if Age_DMT_FirstDate ge 25 then agecat_DMT_FirstDate='25+';
    year_DMT_FirstDate=year(DMT_FirstDate);
run;
%freq(data=_BHA5a, table = year_DMT_FirstDate * agecat_DMT_FirstDate);

/*5.b What first DMT were prescribed*/
%print(data=_BHA2c1);

%sqljoinv2(
    t1=_BHA5a,
    t2=_BHA2c1,
    target=_BHA5b,
    distinct=1,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.DIN, t2.generic_name, t2.class_short),
    jtype=inner,
    jterm = %str(t1.key_hsn = t2.key_hsn and t1.DMT_FirstDate=t2.Rx_ddddd),
    orderby=%str(key_hsn)
);


proc tabulate data=_BHA5b ;
/*    where Age_DMT_FirstDate < 25 ;*/
    class Generic_Name year_DMT_FirstDate agecat_DMT_FirstDate;
    table
    /*rows*/
        year_DMT_FirstDate
    ,
    /*cols*/
    agecat_DMT_FirstDate *         Generic_Name
    ;
run;
s///
t///

children.name: Q BFA
children.NodeDescription:
///t
Question:What if there are patients missing age and sex info
t///

children.name: Q BFB
children.NodeDescription:
///t
Q BBHow many patients < 18 yeas old at entryHow many had an onset (the first MS dx) before 18 
t///

children.name: QBFB Test
children.NodeDescription:
///t
BB Q11.1a.2.Q1Tests for Q_BBHow many patients had an onset (the first MS dx) before 18How many received a DMT before 18 [Why]Re Charity's email to shy516 on 20181213. The team want to know whether or not there are enough number of young patients for separate analyses [End of why]
t///

children.name: QBFB
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*Q BB # patients <= 18 at entry*/

/*%print(data=localt.ba)
%freq(data=localt.ba, table=first_admin_code_year)
*/
data _null_;run;

/*QBB1, from localt.ba (the cohort, select those with age_first_admin_code_date < 18 )*/
data QBB1;
    set localt.ba;
    if age_first_admin_code_date < 18;
    firstRxYear=year(firstRxDate_ever);
    firstDxYear = year(DxDate);
run;

/*QBB2, # patients < 18 at the first dx group them by firstDxYear*/
%MakeCategories(
Data=QBB1,
theVar=firstDxYear,
theTargetVar=FirstYear_Cat,
theCutOffs=1996 1999 2002 2005 2008 2011 2015,
dlmt=,
debug=,
closeSide=left,
target=QBB2a
);
%freq(data=QBB2a, table=FirstYear_Cat, option=%str(nopct norow nocol out=QBB2));

/*QBB3, # patients < 18 at the first Rx of DMT by firstRxYear*/
    /*QBB3a. get those with firstRxDate_ever <= dxDate*/
    data QBB3a;
        set QBB1;
        if firstRxDate_ever ne . ;
        age_firstRx = int( yrdif(birth, firstRxDate_ever, 'age'));
        if age_firstRx <18;
    run;

%freq(data=QBB3a, table=firstDxYear);
%freq(data=QBB3a, table=firstRxYear);

children.NodeDescription:
///t
AE.Q11.1a.1.5.QTest1Tests for Q_AE1How many cases in the first year are possibly prevalent users?[Why][End of Why]1. List out the cases by year (from CA. In CA, those are excluded if not having age, sex, and coverage info)2. From CA, exclud those who, within 1 to 5 years prior to the first_admin_code_date, had MS related diagnostic codes in hospitalization or physician service records, or had MS DMD claims in the pharmacy data.2.1 From AEA1, select cases since the first_admin_code_year >= &;DataStartYear + &;Years_lookback e.g., if DataStartYear=1996 and &;Years_lookback = 1, then select cases since 1997. Cases in 1996 will be excluded as unable to determine the prior MS diagnoses and DMD dispensations2.2 Combine the MS diagnostic records and DMD claims from the hospital data (in AA), the physician service data (in AB),and the pharamcy claims (in AD4)2.2.1Get a distinct list of patient and dxdate from the aforementioned three sources2.2.2 keep distinct combination of studyID and dxDate2.3 For cases in AEA2a, exclude those in AEA2b if  first_admin_code_date - dxDate between 1 and &;Years_lookback * 365.24 daysi.e., excluding those with MS diagnosis or receiving DMD within &;years_lookback prior to the first_admin_code_date2.3.1, from AEA2a, select those having MS diagnosis or DMD claims within the lookback period2.3.2, form AEA2a, exclude those in AEA2c1 (excluding those having MS diagnoses or DMD claims within the lookback)3. report the number of cases by first_admin_code_year
t///

children.name: AEA Qtest1
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
AE.Q1
1.1a.1.5.QTest1
Tests for Q_AE1

How many cases in the first year are possibly prevalent users?

[Why]


[End of Why]
*/

data _null_;run;

%let theStudyID=Key_hsn;
%let theCohortReportPath=%str(P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Output\Reports);
%let theCohortReportFile=%str(Cohort-characteristics-DRUMS-Aug2018v10-SK.xlsx);

%let theSheet=%str(MS patients by year);
%let CloseXls=;

%let DataStartYear=1996;
/*
1. List out the cases by year (from the data set CA. In CA, those are excluded if not having age, sex or coverage info)
*/
%freq(data=localt.CA noprint, table=first_admin_code_year, option=%str(out=AEA1a));
data AEA1b;
    set AEA1a;
    col='c' || strip(first_admin_code_year);
run;
%transpose(data=AEA1b, target=AEA1, rowhead=, colhead=col, contents=count);
/*report*/
    %SASToXlsRange(
            xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
            xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
            data=AEA1,
            SheetName=&theSheet,
            cellRow=3,
            cellCol=%eval(&DataStartYear - 1982),
            selectSheet=1,
            waitSec=,
            removeChar=,
            debug=,
            closeFile=&CloseXls
    );

/*2. From CA, exclud those who, within 1 to 5 years prior to the first_admin_code_date, had MS related diagnostic codes in
    hospitalization or physician service records, or had MS DMD claims in the pharmacy data.*/
/*2.1 From AEA1, select cases since the first_admin_code_year >= &DataStartYear + &Years_lookback
    e.g., if DataStartYear=1996 and &Years_lookback = 1, then select cases since 1997.
        Cases in 1996 will be excluded as unable to determine the prior MS diagnoses and DMD dispensations
    */
%macro TestExcludePrevCase;
    %local Years_lookback;

    %do Years_lookback = 1 %to 1;
                Data AEA2a;
                    set localt.CA;
                    if first_admin_code_year >= %eval( &DataStartYear + &Years_lookback );
                run;

            /*2.2 Combine the MS diagnostic records and DMD claims from the hospital data (in AA), the physician service data (in AB),
                    and the pharamcy claims (in AD4)*/
                /*2.2.1    %print(data=localt.AA);%print(data=localt.AB);%print(data=localt.AD4);*/
                data AEA2b1;
                    set localt.AA localT.AB localt.AD4;
                    keep &theStudyID dxDate;
                run;
                /*2.2.2 keep distinct combination of studyID and dxDate*/
                %distinct(data=AEA2b1, target=AEA2b, vars=%str(&theStudyID, dxDate));

            /*2.3 For cases in AEA2a, exclude those in AEA2b if first_admin_code_date - dxDate between 1 and &Years_lookback * 365.24 days
                    i.e., excluding those with MS diagnosis or receiving DMD within &years_lookback prior to the first_admin_code_date
                */
                /*2.3.1, from AEA2a, select those having MS diagnosis or DMD claims within the lookback period*/
                %sqljoinv2(
                    t1=AEA2a,
                    t2=AEA2b,
                    target=AEA2c1,
                    vars=t1.*,
                    jtype=left,
                    jvars=&theStudyID,
                    distinct=1,
                    filters=%str(t1.first_admin_code_date - t2.dxDate between 1 and &Years_lookback * 365.24)
                );
                /*2.3.2, form AEA2a, exclude those in AEA2c1 (excluding those having MS diagnoses or DMD claims within the lookback)*/
                %sqljoinv2(
                    t1=AEA2a,
                    target=AEA2C,
                    vars=t1.*,
                    filters=%str(&theStudyID not in (select &theStudyID from AEA2c1))
                );

                /*3. report the number of cases by first_admin_code_year*/
                %freq(data=AEA2C noprint, table=first_admin_code_year, option=%str(out=AEA3a));
                data AEA3b;
                    set AEA3a;
                    col='c' || strip(first_admin_code_year);
                run;
                %transpose(data=AEA3b, target=AEA3, rowhead=, colhead=col, contents=count);
                /*Report it */
                %SASToXlsRange(
                    xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
                    xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
                    data=AEA3,
                    SheetName=&theSheet,
                    cellRow=%eval(3 + &Years_lookback),
                    cellCol=%eval(&DataStartYear - 1982 + &Years_lookback),
                    selectSheet=1,
                    waitSec=,
                    removeChar=,
                    debug=,
                    closeFile=&CloseXls
                );


    %end; /*end looping Years_lookback*/
%mend TestExcludePrevCase;
%TestExcludePrevCase;



s///
t///

children.name: AEAA Qtest1A
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*AEAA. test look back for MS cases */
%let theStudyID=Key_hsn;
%let theServeDate=Rx_ddddd;
data _null_;run;

%macro n3;
    /*Combine AA and AB to get diagnostic records (dx records) from hospital file (hosp), and physician claims (phy)*/
    data AEAA0a1;
        set localt.AA localt.AB;
        Disease='MS';
        keep &theStudyID DxDate Src Disease;
    run;

    /*keep records of patients in (excluding those not have phrs info on age sex, etc)*/
    %sqljoinv2(
        t1=AEAA0a1,
        t2=localt.DA,
        target=AEAA0a,
        vars=t1.*,
        jtype=inner,
        jvars=&theStudyID
    );

    /*prepare a list of DMD claims by distinct patients and dates*/
    /*1. From localt.AD1 (all DMD Rx), select distinct records of patientID, DIN and serveDate*/
    %distinct(data=localt.AD1, target=AEAA0b1a, vars=%str(&theStudyID, DIN, &theServeDate));
    /*keep records of patients in (excluding those not have phrs info on age sex, etc)*/
    %sqljoinv2(
        t1=AEAA0b1a,
        t2=localt.DA,
        target=AEAA0b1,
        vars=t1.*,
        jtype=inner,
        jvars=&theStudyID
    );
    /*2. From above, select distinct records of patientID, serveDate, and src*/
    %distinct(data=AEAA0b1, target=AEAA0b2,
            vars=%str(&theStudyID, &theServeDate), orderby=%str(&theStudyID, &theServeDate));

%mend n3;

%macro testLookbackYr;

    %local dataStartYear NCasesFound NCasesExcld target i;
    %let target=localt.test_lookback;
    data ⌖
        delete;
    run;

    %do dataStartYear=1996 %to 2018;

            /*AEAA1. combine AA and AB to get diagnostic records (dx records) from hospital file (hosp), and physician claims (phy)*/
            data AEAA1;
                set AEAA0a;
                if year(dxDate) ge &dataStartYear;
            run;
/*%macro n;*/
            /*AEAA2. select qualified MS cases according to dx records from AEAA1*/
            %CaseDefV2(
                data=AEAA1,
                target=AEAA2,
                studyID=&theStudyID,
                dxDateCol=dxDate,
                nDX=3,
                DxYears=,
                DxGapDays=,
                DQDateOrder=,
                theDiseaseCol=Disease,
                sameDxcode=,
                debug=
            );
/*%mend n;*/

            /*AEAA3 determine those solely identified by MSDMD claims (Rx)*/
                        /*get the Rx claims since &dataStartYear*/
                        data AEAA3a0;
                            set AEAA0b2;
                            if year(&theServeDate) ge &dataStartYear;
                        run;

                        /*a. From above, select the earliest servedate by patient, and indicate the date as the dxDate*/
                        data AEAA3a;
                            set AEAA3a0;
                            by &theStudyID &theServeDate;
                            if first.&theStudyID;
                            rename &theServeDate = dxDate;
                            src='m';
                        run;

                        /*b. Select those in AEAA3a but not in AEAA2.
                            Those are MS cases only can be identified from the dispensation claims*/
                        %sqljoinv2(
                            t1=AEAA3a,
                            target=AEAA3,
                            vars=%str(t1.*, 1 as Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN),
                            filters=%str(&theStudyID not in (select &theStudyID from AEAA2))
                        );

            /*AEAA4, combine AC and AD, drop the col 'disease'. For those missing value of Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN (from hospital
                or physician service claims), indicate Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0
                AEAA4 contains all patients identified from hosp, phy, and Rx files*/
            data AEAA4;
                set AEAA2 AEAA3;
                drop disease;
                if Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=. then Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0;
            run;
            /*%freq(data=AEAA4, table=src * Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN);*/

            /*AEAA5. Determine the First_admin_code_date by linking the first date of DMD (in AEAA3a) to the cases in AEAA4
                Note. It could be that MS cases were identified from the hospital/physician service records, while also receiving
                    MS medications (DMD), and the date of the first dispensation of DMD is earleir than any dxDates from the hospital
                        or physician service file. In that case, the First_admin_code_date = the first First_admin_code_date date
                ??? need to check
            */
            %sqljoinv2(
                t1=AEAA4,
                t2=AEAA3a,
                target=AEAA5,
                vars=%str(t1.*, t2.dxDate as firstRxDate_Ever,
                                    case
                                        when t2.dxDate=. then t1.dxDate
                                        when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate <= t2.dxDate then t1.DxDate
                                        when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate > t2.dxDate then t2.dxDate
                                    end
                                    format date9. as First_admin_code_date
                            ),
                jtype=left,
                jvars=&theStudyID
            );

            /*AEAA6 From above, drop the colum firstRxDate, indicate the calendar year
                AEAA6 contains all MS patients who can be identified since &dataStartYear, with first_admin timing data*/
            data AEAA6;
                set AEAA5;
                First_admin_code_Year=year(First_admin_code_date);
            run;

            /*combine all records of dx from hosp and phy files, and Rx from DMD claims (between 1996 and 2018 )*/
            data AEAA7;
                set AEAA0a AEAA0b2;
                if dxDate= . then dxDate=&theServeDate;
            run;
            /*for each patients, select dx records before the first_admin_code_date*/
            %sqljoinv2(
                t1=AEAA6,
                t2=AEAA7,
                target=AEAA8,
                distinct=1,
                vars=%str(t1.&theStudyID, t1.First_admin_code_date,
                                    t1.First_admin_code_year,
                                int((t1.First_admin_code_date - t2.dxDate )/365.24)+1 as lookbackYr
                            ),
                jtype=inner,
                jvars=&theStudyID,
                filters=%str(t2.dxDate < t1.First_admin_code_date)
            );

            /*get the # cases found since &dataStartYear*/
            %nobs(data=AEAA6);
            %let NCasesFound=&nobs;
            %let nobs=;


            %macro lookbackYears;
                %local i;
                %do i = 0 %to &dataStartYear - 1996;

                    %if &i = 0 %then %do;
                        data AEAA10;
                            dataStartYear=&dataStartYear;
                            ncasesfound=&ncasesfound;
                            lookback=0;
                            ncasesExcld=0;
                            ncasesRemain=&ncasesfound;
                        run;                        
                        %goto skipforfirstYear;
                    %end;
                        /*those can be found if looking back for i years (cases to be excluded)*/
                        %distinct(data=AEAA8, target=AEAA9a, vars=&theStudyID, filters=%str(lookbackyr le &i));
                        %nobs(data=AEAA9a);
                        %let NCasesExcld=&nobs;
                        %let nobs=;

                        /*those in AEAA6, but not in AEAA9a (the remaining cases)*/
                        %distinct(data=AEAA6, target=AEAA9, vars=&theStudyID,
                            filters=%str(&theStudyID not in (select &theStudyID from AEAA9a)));
                        %nobs(data=AEAA9);
                        data AEAA10;
                            dataStartYear=&dataStartYear;
                            ncasesfound=&ncasesfound;
                            lookback=&i;
                            ncasesExcld=&NCasesExcld;
                            ncasesRemain=&nobs;
                        run;
                        %let nobs=;
%skipforfirstYear:
                        data ⌖
                            set &target AEAA10;
                        run;
                %end;
                proc datasets nolist;
                    delete AEAA9a AEAA9 AEAA10;
                run;
            %mend lookbackYears;
            %lookbackYears;

            proc datasets nolist;
                delete AEAA1: AEAA2: AEAA3: AEAA4: AEAA5: AEAA6: AEAA7: AEAA8:;
            run;

        %end; /*end looping for years*/


%mend testLookbackYr;
*%testLookbackYr;
data AEAA21;
    set localt.test_lookback;
    sy='sy' || strip(datastartyear);
run;

/*make a template of complete combination of datastartyears and lookbackyears*/
data AEAA22;
    do dataStartYear = 1996 to 2018;
        do lookback = 0 to 2018-1996;
            sy= 'sy' || strip(datastartyear);
            output;
        end;
    end;
run;
/*Link the test data to the complete combination */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=AEAA22,
    t2=localt.test_lookback,
    target=AEAA23,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.ncasesRemain),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=dataStartYear lookback
);
%transpose(data=AEAA23, rowhead=lookback, colhead=sy, contents=ncasesRemain, target=AEAA24);
%let theCohortReportPath=%str(P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Output\Reports);
%let theCohortReportFile=%str(Cohort-characteristics-DRUMS-Aug2018v10-SK.xlsx);

%let theSheet=%str(Incidence by lookback);
%let CloseXls=;
%let theDataStartYear=1996;
/*report*/
data AEAA25;
    set AEAA24;
    drop lookback;
run;
    %SASToXlsRange(
            xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
            xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
            data=AEAA25,
            SheetName=&theSheet,
            cellRow=3,
            cellCol=%eval(&theDataStartYear - 1981),
            selectSheet=1,
            waitSec=,
            removeChar=,
            debug=,
            closeFile=&CloseXls
    );

t///

children.name: AEAA Qtest1A2
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*AEAB. test look back for MS cases */
data _null_;run;


%let theStudyID=Key_hsn;

%macro testLookbackYr2;

    %let target=localt.test_lookback2;
    data ⌖
        delete;
    run;

    %do dataStartYear=1996 %to 2018;

            /*AEAB1. combine AA and AB to get diagnostic records (dx records) from hospital file (hosp), and physician claims (phy)*/
            data AEAB1;
                set AEAB0a;
                if year(dxDate) ge &dataStartYear;

            /*AEAB2. select qualified MS cases according to dx records from AEAB1*/

            );
/*%mend n;*/

            /*AEAB3 determine those solely identified by MSDMD claims (Rx)*/

                            if year(&theServeDate) ge &dataStartYear;

            /*AEAB4, combine AC and AD, drop the col 'disease'. For those missing value of Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN (from hospital
                or physician service claims), indicate Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0
                AEAB4 contains all patients identified from hosp, phy, and Rx files, and the */

                target=AEAB5,
                vars=%str(t1.*, t2.dxDate as firstRxDate_Ever,
                                    case
                                        when t2.dxDate=. then t1.dxDate
                                        when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate <= t2.dxDate then t1.DxDate
                                        when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate > t2.dxDate then t2.dxDate
                                    end
                                    format date9. as First_admin_code_date
                            ),
                jtype=left,
                jvars=&theStudyID
            );

            /*AEAB6 From above, drop the colum firstRxDate, indicate the calendar year
                AEAB6 contains all MS patients who can be identified since &dataStartYear, with first_admin timing data
                and those withi the first_admin_code_date in the &dataStartYear*/
            data AEAB6;
                set AEAB5;
                First_admin_code_Year=year(First_admin_code_date);
                if year(First_admin_code_date) =&dataStartYear;
            run;

            /*combine all records of dx from hosp and phy files, and Rx from DMD claims (between 1996 and 2018 )*/
            data AEAB7;
                set AEAB0a AEAB0b2;
                if dxDate= . then dxDate=&theServeDate;
            run;
            /*for each patients, select dx records before the first_admin_code_date*/
            %sqljoinv2(
                t1=AEAB6,
                t2=AEAB7,
                target=AEAB8,
                distinct=1,
                vars=%str(t1.&theStudyID, t1.First_admin_code_date,
                                    t1.First_admin_code_year,
                                int((t1.First_admin_code_date - t2.dxDate )/365.24)+1 as lookbackYr
                            ),
                jtype=inner,
                jvars=&theStudyID,
                filters=%str(t2.dxDate < t1.First_admin_code_date)
            );

            /*get the # cases found since &dataStartYear*/
            %nobs(data=AEAB6);
            %let NCasesFound=&nobs;
            %let nobs=;


            %macro lookbackYears2;
                %local i;
                %do i = 0 %to &dataStartYear - 1996;

                    %if &i = 0 %then %do;
                        data AEAB10;
                            dataStartYear=&dataStartYear;
                            ncasesfound=&ncasesfound;
                            lookback=0;
                            ncasesExcld=0;
                            ncasesRemain=&ncasesfound;
                        run;                        
                        %goto skipforfirstYear;
                    %end;
                        /*those can be found if looking back for i years (cases to be excluded)*/
                        %distinct(data=AEAB8, target=AEAB9a, vars=&theStudyID, filters=%str(lookbackyr le &i));
                        %nobs(data=AEAB9a);
                        %let NCasesExcld=&nobs;
                        %let nobs=;

                        /*those in AEAB6, but not in AEAB9a (the remaining cases)*/
                        %distinct(data=AEAB6, target=AEAB9, vars=&theStudyID,
                            filters=%str(&theStudyID not in (select &theStudyID from AEAB9a)));
                        %nobs(data=AEAB9);
                        data AEAB10;
                            dataStartYear=&dataStartYear;
                            ncasesfound=&ncasesfound;
                            lookback=&i;
                            ncasesExcld=&NCasesExcld;
                            ncasesRemain=&nobs;
                        run;
                        %let nobs=;
%skipforfirstYear:
                        data ⌖
                            set &target AEAB10;
                        run;
                %end;
/*                proc datasets nolist;*/
/*                    delete AEAB9a AEAB9 AEAB10;*/
/*                run;*/
            %mend lookbackYears2;
            %lookbackYears2;

/*            proc datasets nolist;*/
/*                delete AEAB1: AEAB2: AEAB3: AEAB4: AEAB5: AEAB6: AEAB7: AEAB8:;*/
/*            run;*/

        %end; /*end looping for years*/


%mend testLookbackYr2;
%testLookbackYr2;
data AEAB21;
    set localt.test_lookback2;
    sy='sy' || strip(datastartyear);
run;

/*make a template of complete combination of datastartyears and lookbackyears*/
data AEAB22;
    do dataStartYear = 1996 to 2018;
        do lookback = 0 to 2018-1996;
            sy= 'sy' || strip(datastartyear);
            output;
        end;
    end;
run;
/*Link the test data to the complete combination */
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=AEAB22,
    t2=localt.test_lookback2,
    target=AEAB23,
    vars=%str(t1.*, t2.ncasesRemain),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=dataStartYear lookback
);
%transpose(data=AEAB23, rowhead=lookback, colhead=sy, contents=ncasesRemain, target=AEAB24);
%let theCohortReportPath=%str(P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Output\Reports);
%let theCohortReportFile=%str(Cohort-characteristics-DRUMS-Aug2018v10-SK.xlsx);

%let theSheet=%str(Incidence by lookback2);
%let CloseXls=;
%let theDataStartYear=1996;
/*report*/
data AEAB25;
    set AEAB24;
    drop lookback;
run;
    %SASToXlsRange(
            xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
            xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
            data=AEAB25,
            SheetName=&theSheet,
            cellRow=3,
            cellCol=%eval(&theDataStartYear - 1981),
            selectSheet=1,
            waitSec=,
            removeChar=,
            debug=,
            closeFile=&CloseXls
    );

children.name: AE.QTest2
children.NodeDescription:
///t
AE.Q21.1a.1.5.QTest2Tests for Q_AE2[Why]Missing of data in a particular time period(e.g., missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claims before 2008) may have impact to MS case identification. The types of impact include:Despite of the various patterns, the interest rests on the following:1) whether the patient can still be identified2) is the first_admin_code_date changedFor these two measures, the idea is to compare the difference between two scenarios of a selected calendar year:1) with all data sources (physician service, hospitalizaiton, pharmacy claims)2) with data source but non-adjudicated pharmacy records of a year. The analysis is repeated for calendar years (for SK, from 2006 to 2017), such to illustrate the impact by different years. [End of why]0.The cases identified from all sources0.0.1 Create an empty dataset (AEB) to store the final results.0.0.2 Cases identified by all sources (in Data set CA, which excludes those not have age, sex, or coverage info) 0.1. add the number of cases (by complete data) into the final report data1. Cases identified by sources without non-adjudicated claim data before and in the specified year (e.g., 2006)1.1. MS cases identified from hospital and MSB data (in AC)1.2. From ms_DMD related pharmacy claims(AD1, prepared in program AD), select claims from adjudicated data of all time,  and those from non-adjudicated data after the specified yeare.g., after 20081.2.1. From AD1, select distinct records of patientID, DIN and serveDate1.2.2. From above, select distinct records of patientID, serveDate, and src1.2.3. From above, select the earliest servedate by patient, and indicate the date as the dxDate1.2.4. Select those in AEB_1B3 but not in AEB_1A. Those are MS cases only can be identified from the dispensation claims1.3 Combine AEB_1A and AEB_1B, to have the cohort identified from sources other than the non-adjudicated pharamcy claim of the year1.3.1, combine AEB_1A and AEB_1B, drop the col 'disease'. For those missing value of Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN (from hospitalor non-adjudicated pharamcy claim claims), indicate Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=01.3.2. Determine the First_admin_code_date by linking the first date of DMD (in AEB_1B3) to the cases in AEB_1C1Note. It could be that MS cases were identified from the hospital/non-adjudicated pharamcy claim records, while also receiving MS medications (DMD), and the date of the first dispensation of DMD is earleir than any dxDates from the hospitalor non-adjudicated pharamcy claim file. In that case, the First_admin_code_date = the first First_admin_code_date ??? need to check1.3.3 From above, drop the colum firstRxDate, indicate the calendar year1.3.4 exlcuding patients not in data set CA (those not having sex or coverage info)2.compare the cases identified in step 1 (AEB_1C) with cases identifed from all sources (AEB_0A)indicate those only identified when not missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year2.1.1 compare the two data sets (AEB_1C is from data missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year, AEB_0A is from data not missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year)2.1.2 count # patient missing because of abense of non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year3.compare the cases identified in step 1 (AEB_1C) with cases identifed from all sources (AEB_0A)indicate those with a different First_admin_code_date3.1 select cases in both AEB_1C and AEB_0A, indicate whether or not having the same First_admin_code_date3.2 estimate the mean, median of First_admin_code_date days changed because of absence of the physician data3.2.1 the mean and STD of days delayed3.2.2 the median and IQR of days delayed3.2.3 the number of cases with exactly the median days-delayed3.2.4 Putting the stats of the specified year together4.Merge the year specific results into the final report data set (AEB)
t///

children.name: AEB.Qtest2
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
AEB.Q2
1.1a.1.5.QTest2
Tests for Q_AE2

[Why]
    Missing of data in a particular time period(e.g., missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claims before 2008) may have impact to MS case identification. The types of impact include:

    Despite of the various patterns, the interest rests on the following:
    1) whether the patient can still be identified
    2) is the first_admin_code_date changed

    For these two measures, the idea is to compare the difference between two scenarios of a selected calendar year:
    1) with all data sources (non-adjudicated pharamcy claim, hospitalizaiton, pharmacy claims)
    2) with data source but non-adjudicated pharmacy records of a year.
    The analysis is repeated for calendar years (for SK, from 2008 to 2017), such to illustrate the impact by different years.
[End of why]
*/


data _null_;run;

%let theStudyID=key_hsn;
%let theServeDate=Rx_ddddd;

%let theCohortReportPath=%str(P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Output\Reports);
%let theCohortReportFile=%str(Cohort-characteristics-DRUMS-Aug2018v10-SK.xlsx);

%let theSheet=%str(Missing Pharmacy Claims);
%let CloseXls=;

%macro test_MissingPharmacyData(debug=);
    %local theYear debug;

    /*0.0.1 Create an empty dataset (AEB) to store the final results.*/
    data localt.AEB;
    run;
    /*0.0.2 Cases identified by all sources (in Data set CA, which excludes those not have age, sex, or coverage info) */
    data AEB_0A;
        set localt.CA;
    run;

    %do theYear = 2008 %to 2018;

                    /*0.1. add the number of cases (by complete data) into the final report data*/
                    %nobs(data=AEB_0A);
                    data AEB_0B;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        theCat='N_completeData';
                        N_completeDATA=&nobs;
                        theStat=strip(put(N_completeDATA, comma8.));
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    %let nobs=;

                    /*1. Cases identified by sources without non-adjudicated claim data before and in the specified year (e.g., 2006)*/
                    /*
                    1.1. MS cases identified from hospital and MSB data (in AC)*/
                    Data AEB_1A;
                        set localt.AC;
                    run;
                    /*%freq(data=AEB_1A, table=src);*/

                    /*
                    1.2. From ms_DMD related pharmacy claims(AD1, prepared in program AD), select
                        claims from adjudicated data of all time, and those from non-adjudicated data after the specified year
                        e.g., after 2008
                    */
                    /*1.2.1. From AD1, select distinct records of patientID, DIN and serveDate*/

                    %distinct(data=localt.AD1, target=AEB_1B1,
                                vars=%str(&theStudyID, DIN, &theServeDate),
                                filters=%str(dpSrc='be' or (DpSrc='nb' and year(&theServeDate) GT &theYear))
                    );

                    /*1.2.2. From above, select distinct records of patientID, serveDate, and src*/
                    %distinct(data=AEB_1B1, target=AEB_1B2, vars=%str(&theStudyID, &theServeDate),
                    orderby=%str(&theStudyID, &theServeDate));

                    /*1.2.3. From above, select the earliest servedate by patient, and indicate the date as the dxDate*/
                    data AEB_1B3;
                        set AEB_1B2;
                        by &theStudyID &theServeDate;
                        if first.&theStudyID;
                        rename &theServeDate = dxDate;
                        src='m';
                    run;

                    /*1.2.4. Select those in AEB_1B3 but not in AEB_1A. Those are MS cases only can be identified from the dispensation claims*/
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=AEB_1B3,
                        target=AEB_1B,
                        vars=%str(t1.*, 1 as Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN),
                        filters=%str(key_hsn not in (select key_hsn from AEB_1A))
                    );

                    /*1.3 Combine AEB_1A and AEB_1B, to have the cohort identified from sources other than the non-adjudicated pharamcy claim of the year*/

                    /*1.3.1, combine AEB_1A and AEB_1B, drop the col 'disease'. For those missing value of Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN (from hospital
                        or non-adjudicated pharamcy claim claims), indicate Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0*/
                    data AEB_1C1;
                        set AEB_1A AEB_1B;
                        drop disease;
                        if Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=. then Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0;
                    run;
                    /*%freq(data=AEB_1C1, table=src * Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN);*/

                    /*1.3.2. Determine the First_admin_code_date by linking the first date of DMD (in AEB_1B3) to the cases in AEB_1C1
                        Note. It could be that MS cases were identified from the hospital/non-adjudicated pharamcy claim records, while also receiving
                            MS medications (DMD), and the date of the first dispensation of DMD is earleir than any dxDates from the hospital
                                or non-adjudicated pharamcy claim file. In that case, the First_admin_code_date = the first First_admin_code_date
                        ??? need to check
                    */
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=AEB_1C1,
                        t2=AEB_1B3,
                        target=AEB_1C2,
                        vars=%str(t1.*, t2.dxDate as firstRxDate_Ever,
                                            case
                                                when t2.dxDate=. then t1.dxDate
                                                when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate <= t2.dxDate then t1.DxDate
                                                when t2.dxDate ne . and t1.dxDate > t2.dxDate then t2.dxDate
                                            end
                                            format date9. as First_admin_code_date
                                    ),
                        jtype=left,
                        jvars=&theStudyID
                    );

                    /*1.3.3 From above, drop the colum firstRxDate_Ever, indicate the calendar year*/
                    data AEB_1C3;
                        set AEB_1C2;
                        First_admin_code_Year=year(First_admin_code_date);
                        drop firstRxDate_Ever dxDate;
                    run;

                    /*1.3.4 exlcuding patients not in data set CA (those not having sex or coverage info)*/
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=AEB_1C3,
                        target=AEB_1C,
                        vars=*,
                        filters=%str(&theStudyID in (select &theStudyID from localt.CA))
                    );

                    /*%freq(data=AEB_1C, table=src*Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN);*/

                    /*2.compare the cases identified in step 1 (AEB_1C) with cases identifed from all sources (AEB_0A)
                        indicate those only identified when not missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year
                    */
                    /*2.1.1 compare the two data sets (AEB_1C is from data missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year,
                        AEB_0A is from data not missing non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year)*/
                    %compAB(a=AEB_0A, b=AEB_1C, target=AEB_2A1, vars=&theStudyID);
                    /*2.1.2 count # patient missing because of abense of non-adjudicated pharamcy claim data of the year*/
                    %freq(data=AEB_2A1 noprint, table=compAB, option=%str(out=AEB_2A2));
                    data AEB_2A;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_2A2;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        if compAB='InA';
                        theCat='N_Missing';
                        theStat=strip(put(count,comma8.)) || "(" || strip(put(percent/100, percent8.1)) || ")";
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*if the above data set is empty, create a dummy and make theStat=0. This is to ensure that in
                            the later combined summary table, the statistics about the current measure is not skipped*/
                    %nobs(data=AEB_2A);
                    %if &nobs=0 %then %do;
                        data AEB_2A;
                            theYear=&theYear;
                            theCat='N_Missing';
                            theStat='0';
                        run;
                    %end;
                    %let nobs=;
                    data AEB_2B;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_2A2;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        if compAB='Both';
                        theCat='N_NotMissing';
                        theStat=strip(put(count,comma8.)) || "(" || strip(put(percent/100, percent8.1)) || ")";
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*if the above data set is empty, create a dummy and make theStat=0. This is to ensure that in
                            the later combined summary table, the statistics about the current measure is not skipped*/
                    %nobs(data=AEB_2B);
                    %if &nobs=0 %then %do;
                        data AEB_2B;
                            theYear=&theYear;
                            theCat='N_NotMissing';
                            theStat='0';
                        run;
                    %end;
                    %let nobs=;
                    /*3.compare the cases identified in step 1 (AEB_1C) with cases identifed from all sources (AEB_0A)
                        indicate those with a different First_admin_code_date*/
                    /*3.1 select cases in both AEB_1C and AEB_0A, indicate whether or not having the same First_admin_code_date*/
                    %sqljoinv2(
                        t1=AEB_0A,
                        t2=AEB_1C,
                        target=AEB_3A1,
                        vars=%str(t1.&theStudyID, t2.src,
                                        t2.First_admin_code_date - t1.First_admin_code_date as First_admin_code_date_diff),
                        jtype=inner,
                        jvars=&theStudyId
                    );
                    data AEB_3A;
                        set AEB_3A1;
                        if First_admin_code_date_diff >0 then First_admin_code_date_change=1;
                        if First_admin_code_date_diff <0 then First_admin_code_date_change=-1;
                        if First_admin_code_date_diff =0 then First_admin_code_date_change=0;
                    run;
                    %freq(data=AEB_3A noprint, table=First_admin_code_date_change, option=%str(out=AEB_3A2));
                    data AEB_3A3;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_3A2;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        if First_admin_code_date_change=0;
                        theCat='First_admin_code_date_not_changed';
                        theStat=strip(put(count,comma8.)) || "(" || strip(put(percent/100, percent8.1)) || ")";
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*if the above data set is empty, create a dummy and make theStat=0. This is to ensure that in
                            the later combined summary table, the statistics about the current measure is not skipped*/
                    %nobs(data=AEB_3A3);
                    %if &nobs=0 %then %do;
                        data AEB_3A3;
                            theYear=&theYear;
                            theCat='First_admin_code_date_not_changed';
                            theStat='0';
                        run;
                    %end;
                    %let nobs=;
                    data AEB_3A4;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_3A2;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        if First_admin_code_date_change=1;
                        theCat='First_admin_code_date_changed';
                        theStat=strip(put(count,comma8.)) || "(" || strip(put(percent/100, percent8.1)) || ")";
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*if the above data set is empty, create a dummy and make theStat=0. This is to ensure that in
                            the later combined summary table, the statistics about the current measure is not skipped*/
                    %nobs(data=AEB_3A4);
                    %if &nobs=0 %then %do;
                        data AEB_3A4;
                            theYear=&theYear;
                            theCat='First_admin_code_date_changed';
                            theStat='0';
                        run;
                    %end;
                    %let nobs=;

                    /*3.2 estimate the mean, median of First_admin_code_date days changed because of absence of the physician data*/
                    %GetMeanStats(
                            data=AEB_3A,
                            where=First_admin_code_date_change ne 0,
                            groupVars=,
                            theVar=First_admin_code_date_diff,
                            theStats=mean median,
                            target=AEB_3B1,
                            debug=
                        );
                    /*the mean and STD of days delayed*/
                    data AEB_3B2;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_3B1;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        theCat='Mean_days_changed';
                        theStat=strip(put(mean,comma8.)) || byte(177) || strip(put(std/100, comma8.));
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*the median and IQR of days delayed*/
                    data AEB_3B3;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_3B1;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        theCat='Median_days_changed';
                        theStat=strip(put(median,comma8.)) || "(" || strip(put(std/100, comma8.)) || ")";
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*the number of cases with exactly the median days-delayed*/
                    data AEB_3B4;
                        theYear=&theYear;
                        set AEB_3B1;
                        format theCat $100. theStat $100.;
                        theCat='N_Median';
                        theStat=strip(put(N_Patients_median,comma8.)) ;
                        keep theYear theCat theStat;
                    run;
                    /*Creat a row for the specified year*/
                    data AEB_3B5;
                        format theStat $100.;
                        theStat=strip(put(&theYear, 8.));
                    run;
                    /*Putting the stats together*/
                    data AEB_3B6;
                        set
                        AEB_3B5
                        AEB_0B
                        AEB_2A
                        AEB_2B
                        AEB_3A3
                        AEB_3A4
                         AEB_3B2
                        AEB_3B3
                        AEB_3B4
                        ;
                        keep theStat;
                        rename theStat=theStat_&theYear;
                    run;

                    /*Merge the year specific data into the final dataset*/
                    data localt.AEB;
                        merge localT.AEB AEB_3B6;
                    run;

                %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
                    proc datasets nolist;    
                        delete AEB_:;
                    run;
                %end;

        %end; /*end of loop for years*/

                    /*report*/
                    %SASToXlsRange(
                            xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
                            xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
                            data=Localt.AEB,
                            SheetName=&theSheet,
                            cellRow=3,
                            cellCol=%eval(2008 - 1981),
                            selectSheet=1,
                            waitSec=,
                            removeChar=,
                            debug=,
                            closeFile=&CloseXls
                    );

%mend test_MissingPharmacyData;
%test_MissingPharmacyData(debug=);

children.name: Q_AE3
children.NodeDescription:
///t
Q_AE3What if the patient was diagnosed of MS from hospital or physician service files, but there is a MS drug claim ahead of the diagnosis by hosp or physician?
t///

children.name: AE.QTest3
children.NodeDescription:
///t
AE.Q31.1a.1.5.QTest3Tests for Q_AE3What if the patient was diagnosed of MS from hospital or physician service files, but there is a MS drug claim ahead of the diagnosis by hosp or physician?[Why]To illustrate the sequence of diagnoses:How many patients had MS DMD claims before, on, and after the first_admin_code_dateIn AE, the dxDate is the data of diagnosis from hospital and physician service data. It is the earliest date of diagnosis among the qualified 3. The firstRxDate is the earliestdate receiving an MS DMDThe following is to compare the DxDate and the firstRxDate, indicate which one comes first, and [End of why]
t///

children.name: AEC.Qtest3
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*AEC.Q3
1.1a.1.5.QTest3
Tests for Q_AE3
What if the patient was diagnosed of MS from hospital or physician service files, but there is a MS drug claim ahead of the diagnosis by hosp or physician?
[Why]
    To illustrate the sequence of diagnoses:
    How many patients had MS DMD claims before, on, and after the first_admin_code_date

    In CA, the dxDate is the data of diagnosis from hospital and physician service data. It is the earliest date of diagnosis among the qualified 3. The firstRxDate_Ever is the earliest
    date receiving an MS DMD

    The following is to compare the DxDate and the firstRxDate_Ever, indicate which one comes first, and
[End of why]
*/

data _null_;run;

/*%print(data=localt.CA);*/
data AEC_1A;
    set localt.CA;
    format DxVsRx $100.;
    if firstRxDate_Ever =. then DxVsRx = 'No DMD dispensations';
    if firstRxDate_Ever ne . then do;
        if dxDate > firstRxDate_Ever then DxVsRx = 'DMD dispensation eariler than hospital or physician diagnoses';
        if dxDate = firstRxDate_Ever then DxVsRx = 'DMD dispensation and the earilest hospital or physician diagnosis on the same day';
        if dxDate < firstRxDate_Ever then DxVsRx = 'DMD dispensation later than hospital or physician diagnoses';
    end;
run;
%freq(data=AEC_1A noprint, table=DxVsRx, option=%str(out=AEC_1b));

data AEC_1c;
    set AEC_1b;
    percent=percent /100;
run;

%let theCohortReportPath=%str(P:\DRUMS(EvansC)_Bio18-83\Output\Reports);
%let theCohortReportFile=%str(Cohort-characteristics-DRUMS-Aug2018v10-SK.xlsx);

%let theSheet=%str(Time of RxVsDx);
%let CloseXls=;

%SASToXlsRange(
        xlsFilePath=&theCohortReportPath,
        xlsFileName=&theCohortReportFile,
        data=AEC_1c,
        SheetName=&theSheet,
        cellRow=3,
        cellCol=1,
        selectSheet=1,
        waitSec=,
        removeChar=,
        debug=,
        closeFile=&CloseXls
);

children.name: DA
children.NodeDescription:
///t
DA 3.1a.2.1.1  Variables duringthe study follow-up period1. determine the First_to_last_admin_date in yearsFirst_to_last_admin_date = (Last_reg_date - First_admin_code_date)/365.242. the use of MS medications (DMD) during follow-upfor this part, 2.1 get all DMD claims2.2 determine whether or not receiving ANY DMD between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date2.3 determine whether or not receiving a specific DMD between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date, and the earliest date receiving a specific DMD between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date2.1, get the DMD claims (from AD1 prepared in program AD)received by the patients in DA1 between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date2.2 from DA2a(DMD claims between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date)determine whether or not the patient had received ANY DMD2.2.1 get a distinct list of patient IDs of those appear in DA2a (those are who received DMD during follow-up)2.2.2 link the above back to DA1, for those matched on studyIDs, let AnyDMD_FollowUp=1for those not matched, let  AnyDMD_FollowUp=0 2.3 from DA2a(DMD claims between  First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date)determine whether or not the patient had received a specific subclass of DMD, and the earliest date of dispensationThis is achieved by running the macro 'getUseofSpecDMD' for the following steps:1) select DMD claims satisfying the criteria (e.g., subClass in ('IFNB_1B'))2) sort and keep the earliest claim3) link to the Cohort (e.g., DA2B) to indicate whether or not the patient received a specific DMD, and the firstRxDate1. 'IFNB-1A_IM', 'IFNB-1A_SC', 'IFNB_1B', 'PEGINTERFERON_BETA_1A', 'EXTAVIA'AnyIFNB2. 'IFNB_1B'IFNB1B3.'IFNB-1A_SC'IFNB1ASC4.'IFNB-1A_IM'IFNB1AIM5. 'EXTAVIA'EXTA6.'PEGINTERFERON_BETA_1A'PEGI7. 'GLATIRAMER_ACETATE'AnyGLAT8.'GLATIRAMER_ACETATE'not '02456915'GLAT209.'GLATIRAMER_ACETATE'is '02456915'GLAT4010.'NATALIZUMAB'NATA11.'FINGOLIMOD'FING12.'DIMETHYL_FUMARATE'DIME13.'TERIFLUNOMIDE'TERI14.'DACLIZUMAB'DACL15.'OCRELIZUMAB'OCRE
t///

children.name: DA. 3.1a.2.1.1  Variables duringthe study follow-up period
children.NodeDescription:
///t
///s
/*
DA. 3.1a.2.1.1
Variables during the study follow-up period
*/

data _null_;run;

%let theStudyID=key_hsn;
%let theServeDate=Rx_ddddd;

/* 1. determine the First_to_last_admin_date in years
    First_to_last_admin_date = (Last_reg_date minus First_admin_code_date)/365.24
*/
Data DA1;
    set localt.ca;
    First_to_last_admin_date = (Last_reg_date - First_admin_code_date)/365.24;
run;

/*2. the use of MS medications (DMD) during follow-up
    for this part,
    2.1 get all DMD claims
    2.2 determine whether or not receiving ANY DMD between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date
    2.3 determine whether or not receiving a specific DMD between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date, and
        the earliest date receiving a specific DMD between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date
*/

/*2.1, get the DMD claims (from AD1 prepared in program AD)
    received by the patients in DA1 between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date
*/
/*%print(data=localt.ad1);*/

%sqljoinv2(
    t1=localt.ad1,
    t2=DA1,
    Target=DA2a,
    vars=%str(t1.&theStudyID, t1.&theServeDate, t1.DIN, t1.Generic_name, t1.subClass),
    distinct=1,
    jtype=inner,
    jvars=&theStudyID,
    filters=%str(t1.&theServeDate between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date ),
    orderby=%str(DIN, &theStudyID, &theServeDate)
);

/*2.2 from DA2a(DMD claims between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date)
    determine whether or not the patient had received ANY DMD*/
/*2.2.1 get a distinct list of patient IDs of those appear in DA2a (those are who received DMD during follow-up)*/
%distinct(data=DA2a, target=DA2B1, vars=&theStudyID);
/*2.2.2 link the above back to DA1, for those matched on studyIDs, let AnyDMD_FollowUp=1
    for those not matched, let AnyDMD_FollowUp=0
*/
%sqljoinv2(
    t1=DA1,
    t2=DA2b1,
    Target=DA2B,
    vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.&theStudyID = "", 0, 1) as AnyDMD_FollowUp),
    jtype=left,
    jvars=&theStudyID
);
%freq(data=DA2B, table=AnyDMD_FollowUp);
%freq(data=DA2A, table=subClass);


/*2.3 from DA2a(DMD claims between First_admin_code_date and Last_reg_date)
    determine whether or not the patient had received a specific subclass of DMD, and the earliest date of dispensation*/

%macro getUseofSpecDMD(theRxData=, theCohortData=, theSubClass=, theDINsAre=, theDINsAreNot=,
            theReportClass=, target=, debug=);

    %local theRxData theCohortData theSubClass theDINsAre theDINsAreNot theReportClass target debug;

    /*    %let theRxData=DA2a;*/
    /*    %let theCohortData=DA2b;*/
    /*    %let theSubClass=%str('IFNB-1A_IM', 'IFNB-1A_SC', 'IFNB_1B', 'PEGINTERFERON_BETA_1A', 'EXTAVIA');*/
    /*    %let theDINsAre=;*/
    /*    %let theDINsAreNot=;*/
    /*    %let theReportClass=AnyIFNB;*/


    /*1) select DMD claims satisfying the criteria*/
    data getUseofSpecDMD_tmp1;
        set &theRxData;
        if strip(upcase(SubClass)) in (&theSubClass)
            %if %length(&theDINsAreNot) ne 0 %then %do;
                and DIN not in (&theDINsAreNot)
            %end;
            %if %length(&theDINsAre) ne 0 %then %do;
                and DIN in (&theDINsAre)
            %end;
        ;
    run;
    /*2) sort and keep the earliest claim */
    %sort(data=getUseofSpecDMD_tmp1, sorter=%str(&theStudyID &theServeDate));
    data getUseofSpecDMD_tmp2;
        set getUseofSpecDMD_tmp1;
        by &theStudyID &theServeDate;
        if first.&theStudyID;
        rename &theServeDate = &theReportClass._firstRxDate_Flwp;
        keep &theStudyID &theServeDate;
    run;
    /*3) link to the Cohort (e.g., DA2B) to indicate whether or not the patient received a specific DMD, and the firstRxDate_Flwp */
    %sqljoinv2(
        t1=&theCohortData,
        t2=getUseofSpecDMD_tmp2,
        Target=&target,
        vars=%str(t1.*, ifn(t2.&theReportClass._firstRxDate_Flwp = . , 0, 1) as &theReportClass._FollowUp,
                        t2.&theReportClass._firstRxDate_Flwp,
                        (t1.last_reg_date - t2.&theReportClass._firstRxDate_Flwp)/365.24 as &theReportClass._Yrs1stRx2End
                    ),
        jtype=left,
        jvars=&theStudyID
    );
/*    %freq(data=&target, table=&theReportClass._FollowUp);*/
    
    %if &debug ne 1 %then %do;
        proc datasets nolist;
            delete getUseofSpecDMD_tmp:;
        run;
    %end;
%mend getUseofSpecDMD;

/*
1.
'IFNB-1A_IM', 'IFNB-1A_SC', 'IFNB_1B', 'PEGINTERFERON_BETA_1A', 'EXTAVIA'
AnyIFNB
*/
%getUseofSpecDMD(
    theRxData=DA2a,
    theCohortData=DA2b,
    theSubClass=%str('IFNB-1A_IM', 'IFNB-1A_SC', 'IFNB_1B', 'PEGINTERFERON_BETA_1A', 'EXTAVIA'),
    theDINsAre=,
    theDINsAreNot=,
    theReportClass=AnyIFNB,
    target=DA3A1,
    debug=
);
/*The specific DMD groups are
2.
'IFNB_1B'
IFNB1B
*/
%getUseofSpecDMD(
    theRxData=DA2a,
    theCohortData=DA3A1,
    theSubClass=%str( 'IFNB_1B'),
    theDINsAre=,
    theDINsAreNot=,
    theReportClass=IFNB1B,
    target=DA3A2,
    debug=
);

/*3.
'IFNB-1A_SC'
IFNB1ASC
*/
%getUseofSpecDMD(

    theCohortData=DA3A2,
    theSubClass=%str( 'IFNB-1A_SC'),
    theDINsAre=,

    theReportClass=IFNB1ASC,
    target=DA3A3,
    debug=

/*
4.
'IFNB-1A_IM'
IFNB1AIM

%getUseofSpecDMD(

/*

%getUseofSpecDMD(

children.name: DB
children.NodeDescription:
///t
DB 3.1a.2.1  Report cohort characteristicsReport cohort characteristics3.1a.2.1.1For this report, each column is for a specified subgroup (or all) of the cohort. The following report is done by columnIn this program, the report is about the subgroup of which Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0. The source dataset is DA, which is prepared in prgram DA0. prepare the source data set by selecting those with Cohort1a_ID_DMD_onlyYN=0. 1. prepare and report in row4, # of members in the selected group2. row5, # of members by sex, i.e., female and male3. row8, # of members not missing 'First_admin_code_date'4. row9, # of members missing 'First_admin_code_date (which is the difference between DB1 and DB3)5. row10, mean, SD, median(IQR) of age at 'First_admin_code_date'5.1 get mean SD median IQR of age on "First_admin_code_date"5.2 get mean and SD, and rearrange them into rows in the same table, report mean and SD5.3 get median and IQR, and rearrange them as median (IQR) in the same row, and then report5.4 report the number of patients with exactly the median age (as requested by privacy regulations)6. row13, # of members not missing 'Age_First_admin_code_date7. row15, # of members categorized by calender year at 'First_admin_code_date' (i.e., the var 'First_admin_code_date' created in program AE. Note, to avoid missing values for a level, always create a template with all levels*/8. row22, # of members not missing 'First_admin_code_year9. row24, mean, SD, median(IQR) of 'First_to_last_admin_date9.1 get mean SD median IQR of age on "First_to_last_admin_date"9.2 get mean and SD, and rearrange them into rows in the same table, report mean and SD9.3 get median and IQR, and rearrange them as median (IQR) in the same row, and then report9.4 report the number of patients with exactly the median age (as requested by privacy regulations)11. row27, # of members not missing 'First_to_last_admin_date'*/12. row29, # of members by Any record of MS-specific disease-modifying drug, i.e., AnyDMD_FollowUp14. row31-46, # of members receiving a specific subclass of DMD, e.g., AnyIFNB_FollowUp, etcNote, to avoid missing values for a level, always create a template with all levelsThe report is done by the macro 'ReportNRecieveSub', looping for AnyIFNB_FollowUp=1IFNB1B_FollowUp=1IFNB1ASC_FollowUp=1IFNB1AIM_FollowUp=1EXTA_FollowUp=1PEGI_FollowUp=1AnyGLAT_FollowUp=1GLAT20_FollowUp=1GLAT40_FollowUp=1Nata_FollowUp=1Fing_FollowUp=1Dime_FollowUp=1Teri_FollowUp=1Alem_FollowUp=1Dacl_FollowUp=1Ocre_FollowUp=115. Loop for selected subClass of DMD, and report # of users by sex and calendarYear; age statistics and FirstRx_to_last_admin_date statistics (mean, sd, median (IQR))The report is done by the macro 'ReportNRecieveSub', looping for: Note that for each subgroup, carefully check the year cut off groups. AnyIFNB_FollowUp=1AnyGLAT_FollowUp=1Nata_FollowUp=1Fing_FollowUp=1Dime_FollowUp=1Teri_FollowUp=1Alem_FollowUp=1[The following are not seen in SK drug claims]Dacl_FollowUp=1Ocre_FollowUp=13.1a.2.1.2For this report, each column is for a specified subgroup (or all) of the cohort. The following report is done by columnIn this program, the report is about all members in dataset DA, which is prepared in program DA0. prepare the source data set by selecting all records in Data set DA. Step1 to 15 are the similar to the analyses in 3.1a.2.1.1
